plot(p, tmin, tmax[, label, c, fignum])

Plot the position of the vortex as a function time. pos is a dictionnary obtained from track.position tmin : minimum index tmax : maximum index.

position(M[, field, indices, step, sigma])

Measure the position of the min and max of vorticity over time, + their value, + the associated circulation Return a dictionnary containing all the values

position_index(M, i[, field, display, sigma])

positions(M, i[, field, display, sigma])
